mapper.insert: insert into board (title, price, made_by, writer, category, description, image_file) values (#{title}, #{price}, #{made_by}, #{writer}, #{category}, #{description}, #{image_file})
mapper.select: select bno, title, price, mod_at, read_count, made_by, image_file from board order by bno desc
mapper.update: update board set image_file = NULL where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select image_file from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set read_count = read_count + #{qty} where bno = #{bno}
